title: HELP   Sugestions for a disabled player
body:
I really like LOL but my disability inhibits the effective use of my right hand.  I use a mouse with my left hand but I lost the tactile sense of touch on my right.  I can also use a multi button mouse with my left hand depending on the location of the buttons.  Most mice aren't very left hand friendly.   I can still rely on muscle memory on my right but using a keyboard is difficult.  Any suggestions on a controller, which I can use with my right hand, or a combination of my left hand mouse or something else?  I'm open to any ideas.

Thanks

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our teach team can review your specific issue.  I can't make any guarantees, but maybe we can work something out!
